subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Deaths (Fatalities)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Kurt Budke, Oklahoma State’s women’s basketball coach, and Miranda Serna, an assistant, were on a recruiting trip when the plane crashed Thursday night in Arkansas.
snippet: Kurt Budke, Oklahoma State’s women’s basketball coach, and Miranda Serna, an assistant, were on a recruiting trip when the plane crashed Thursday night in Arkansas.
